n2o:sql.n2o:items-query: select :select from services_template_prescription stp left join services_template st on st.id = stp.template_id where :where order by :order
n2o:sql.n2o:count-query: select count(1) from services_template_prescription stp left join services_template st on st.id = stp.template_id where :where

field.expression:
(select array_to_json(array_agg(t)) from ( select stph.id , holding , stph.count * stph.hold_dose_value as dose , stph.count
from services_template_prescription_holding stph join ( select id, row_to_json(holding) as holding from ( select stphold.id , stphold.holding_id as holding_id , h.name || coalesce(', ' || ft.short_name, '') || coalesce(', ' || CASE WHEN stphold.hold_con_value~'^[0-9]*\.?[0-9]*$' THEN trim(to_char(stphold.hold_con_value::numeric, 'FM9999990.999'), '.') ELSE stphold.hold_con_value END || coalesce(' ' || cm.name,''), '') as holding_full_name , stphold.hold_form_type_id as form_type_id , trim(to_char(stphold.hold_dose_value, 'FM9999990.999'), '.') || ' ' || dm.name as dose_with_measure , stphold.hold_dose_value as dose , stphold.hold_dose_measure_id as dose_measure_id , dm.name as dose_measure_name , stphold.hold_con_value as concentration , stphold.hold_con_measure_id as concentration_measure_id , stphold.hold_mnei_id as mnei_id , (select name from cmn_measure where id = stphold.hold_mnei_id) as mnei_name , h.name || coalesce(', ' || ft.short_name, '') || coalesce(', ' || CASE WHEN stphold.hold_con_value~'^[0-9]*\.?[0-9]*$' THEN trim(to_char(stphold.hold_con_value::numeric, 'FM9999990.999'), '.') ELSE stphold.hold_con_value END || coalesce(' ' || cm.name,''), '') || coalesce(', ' || trim(to_char(stphold.hold_dose_value::numeric, 'FM9999990.999'), '.') || coalesce(' ' || dm.name,''), '') || coalesce(', ' || mnei.name, '') as name_holding from services_template_prescription_holding stphold join inventory.holding h on h.id = stphold.holding_id left join inventory.form_type ft on ft.id = stphold.hold_form_type_id left join cmn_measure dm on dm.id = stphold.hold_dose_measure_id left join cmn_measure cm on cm.id = stphold.hold_con_measure_id left join cmn_measure mnei on mnei.id = stphold.hold_mnei_id order by stphold.id ) holding ) h on h.id = stph.id
where stph.prescription_id = stp.id order by stph.id) as t)
